author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Norse: Oath of Blood in this new teaser trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactics game that plunges players into the heart of the Viking Age. Norse: Oath of Blood will be available on Windows PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2025.

Step into the rugged, untamed beauty of dark age Norway. Embark on an epic quest for vengeance as Gunnar, a young warrior whose destiny is forged in blood and betrayal. After the treacherous Steinarr Far-Spear murders his father, Jarl Gripr, and usurps his high seat, Gunnar's path is clear: rebuild, ally, and rise to reclaim honor and justice.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Norse: Oath of Blood - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Battlefield and Call of Duty are set to go head-to-head again this Fall, with Battlefield 6 dropping in October, and Black Ops 7 in November. But the sentiment after a succesful open beta period is that Battlefield will be the one to grab gamers' attention, with former Blizzard president Mike Ybarra saying that Battlefield will 'boot stomp' CoD this year. But Treyarch's Miles Leslie thinks there's room for both, saying the Black Ops 7 dev is trying to shut out the noise and make the best game they can. In other news, Xbox dropped a trailer for the upcoming DLC to Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, titled 'The Order of Giants.' The trailer also revealed a Switch 2 release sometime next year. And finally, we’ve got a peek at the five immersive worlds of the all-new Universal Epic Universe, and one of its featured attractions – Stardust Racers, all at Universal Orlando Resort.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort, and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.
title: Black Ops 7 Devs Respond to 'Lazy' Call of Duty Accusations - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Michael Myers Returns to Haddonfield. Check out the Halloween trailer for the upcoming asymmetric stealth horror game with single and multiplayer modes from developer and publisher IllFonic, co-published by Gun Interactive, and in partnership with Compass International Pictures and Further Front. Halloween will be available on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PC via Steam and Epic Game Store in 2026.

Step into the chilling world of John Carpenter’s genre-defining film, now transformed into a suspenseful one-versus-many stealth horror experience in Halloween. Put on the iconic mask to become the ultimate slasher, Michael Myers, stalking and executing the citizens of Haddonfield one by one, or striving to thwart Michael Myers’ plans as Civilians determined to save the unaware townsfolk before it’s too late. 

Stick to the shadows as Civilians, seeking out Haddonfield residents to warn them and searching for a way to contact the authorities. As Michael Myers, give them a reason
title: Halloween - Official Announcement Trailer | gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
IGN's Simon Cardy, who got to play Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight, chats with Brian Altano about the new Lego adventure with Bruce Wayne, the coolest cowel-wearer, we collectively know better as Batman.

If you're a fan of the Rocksteady Studios' Batman games Batman: Arkham Aslyum, Batman: Arkham City, and Batman: Arkham Knight, then you'll be in luck. According to Cardy, Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is the perfect combination of Arkham and Lego combat.

Combat aside, it's a lego game, and like other lego games, there's a ton of collectables and skins from decades of Batman movies, comics, and shows. The Tumbler, from Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy (Batman Begins, The Dark Knight, The Dark Knight Rises), is in the game. Odds are there's a reference to your Batman meme and Batman scene. There's tons of Batman references to make the game worthy of its "Legacy of the Dark Knight" title. Villains like Joker, Bane, and Penguin make appearances. Plus, there's also coll
title: Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight- The Perfect Combo of Arkham & Lego Combat | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: We played Elden Ring: Tarnished Edition in handheld mode on Switch 2 and came away very disappointed with the game's performance, especially when in the open areas like Limgrave. Frame rate drops were significant when turning the camera whilst exploring outside of the tutorial area, and this, combined with a confusing button layout on Switch 2, made combat confusing and exploration fairly dispiriting. We weren't allowed to record gameplay at the booth, probably due to this fact, but you can hear our thoughts on Elden Ring Switch 2 handheld gameplay in this video. Elden Ring Tarnished Edition releases in 2025, so hopefully there's time for Bandai Namco to work on its performance.
title: Elden Ring on Switch 2 Is a Disaster in Handheld Mode | gamescom 2025

Ninja Garden 4's producer and director Yuji Nakao reveals why they shifted away from the much-loved character of Ryu to new face Yakumo, goes into detail about its combat upgrades, and discusses how Ninja Garden 4 will continue the challenge the series is best known for.

Ninja Gaiden 4 will be coming to PlayStation, Xbox, and PC on October 21, 2025.

author: IGN
description: Check out the Omni-Man Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, the upcoming fighting game based on the Invincible IP, developed by Quarter Up. Omni-Man is among the most powerful Viltrimites in the Invincible Universe, wielding a brutal and powerful playstyle that offers players the ability to deal out swift and dense attacks to the opposition. Get the rundown on Omni-Man's moves, abilities, and techniques with the developers for Invincible VS, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Harlowe is the latest exciting addition to Borderlands 4's vault hunter line-up. Randy Pitchford, founder and president of Gearbox teases what we can expect from the Gravitar-class hero, plus he reveals more about some of areas to explore and billions (!) of gun combos there are to play around with.

Borderlands 4 will be coming to PlayStation, Xbox, PC and Nintendo Switch 2 in September 12, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Borderlands 4 Has The Weirdest Weapons You'll Ever See | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Is Onimusha: Way of the Sword a triumphant return for the long-dormant franchise? IGN's Matt Purslow and Dale Driver got to play the demo at gamescom 2025 and share their thoughts about the supernatural samurai fighting demon combat and the inevitable Soulslike comparisons. How does Onimusha compare to the obvious Ghost of Tsushima and Sekiro comparisons? Let's find out.
title: Onimusha Could be as Sharp as Sekiro Without the Soulslike Difficulty | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Battling the zombie horde in full plate armor is not something you do every day but there's much more to God Save Birmingham. Creative director Hyeonseong Cha and content manager Guinn Kim explain how surviving in medieval England requires brains, barricades and a cast-iron stomach for when things get really bloody.

God Save Birmingham is due out on PC via Steam early access in 2026.

Presented by Borderlands 4

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Why God Save Birmingham Is Bringing Zombies to Medieval England | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Brutal sword fights and mastering devastating combos are at the heart of Where Winds Meet, an open world Soulslike in which the action is so relentless there's barely time to soak up the gorgeous visuals. It's also  massive, as the development team behind the game reveals in this gameplay walkthrough.

Set during 10th-century China, you play a young sword master uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise. 

Where Winds Meet will be available on PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5) November 14, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Where Winds Meet Could be the Next Big Open World Soulslike | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Brother Day (Lee Pace) experiences a hallucination involving Demerzel (Laura Birn) after drinking a hallucinogenic liquid in this scene from Episode 307 of Foundation, which premieres on Apple TV+ on Friday, August 22.

Set 152 years beyond the events of season two, The Foundation has established itself far beyond their humble beginnings, with a vast sphere of influence, while the Cleonic Dynasty’s Imperium has declined. 

As both of these galactic powers fight for Galactic dominance, a threat to the entire galaxy appears on Kalgan in the fearsome form of a Warlord — The Mule — whose sights are set on no less than ruling the galaxy by any means necessary, including a form of mind control of unparalleled reach: setting the stage for Hari Seldon, the creator of Psychohistory, and his protégé Gaal Dornick, as well as the Cleons and Demerzel, Empire’s power behind the throne, to play a deadly game of intergalactic chess, in which control of the galaxy’s future is increasingly unattainable
title: Foundation Season 3 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Lee Pace, Laura Birn

author: IGN
description:
Meet the citizens of Raev: Kingdom on the Distant Shores and learn about how to build a successful empire, while taking a tour of the vibrant world in this new trailer for the upcoming kingdom-builder game. Build an empire, founding its villages and cities. Every kingdom started with a single bonfire, and RAEV allows you to create your own thriving civilization across a sprawling continent. Craft interwoven cityscapes, inspire your people, and build a kingdom to forge your path to greatness. Rave: Kingdom on the Distant Shores will be available on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Raev: Kingdom on the Distant Shores - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Pioneers of Pagonia gets a new trailer and a version 1.0 release date announcement. Check out the latest Pioneers of Pagonia cinematic trailer for the upcoming city builder game that challenges you to build a thriving community while facing the dangers of an untamed land. Lead your people to success in a procedurally generated and dynamic world. Construct detailed settlements, defend against emerging threats, and optimize resource management. 

Pioneers of Pagonia leaves early access and will be available on PC via Steam on December 11, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Pioneers of Pagonia - Official Version 1.0 Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Explore more of the world with the City 12 - Germany 2 update for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 and 2020, which adds more German cities than ever before as well as a new German air rescue helicopter. Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 and Flight Sim 2020 and the new update are available now on Xbox and Xbox PC. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 - City Update 12 Overview | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the PS5 and Xbox Launch Trailer for Triangle Strategy, a turn-based tactical strategy RPG developed by Square Enix. Players will embark on a grand adventure with HD-2D graphics as a war-stricken continent of Norzelia causes great struggle and despair for the heroes to grapple with. Engage with deep strategic gameplay in Triangle Strategy, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S, alongside the game being available on Nintendo Switch, Meta Quest, and PC (Steam).

#TriangleStrategy #Gaming #IGN
title: Triangle Strategy - Official PS5 and Xbox Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You and your friends may be shrunken, but you are far from helpless. Ride the new Ladybug mount and fight Axle, a massive tarantula boss in the upcoming updates. Build your base, wander the backyard on your buggy, and explore and survive in Grounded 2, a single-player and multi-player adventure. 
This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Grounded 2 - Interview and Upcoming Update Breakdown | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join Ramza in the genre-defining adventure through Ivalice, as he and his allies uncover political treachery and much more. Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles is fully voiced, has gameplay and graphical enhancements, and comes to Xbox Series X/S on September 30th. This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#gamescom2025
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Handheld Compatibility Introduction Trailer for the upcoming ROG Xbox Ally, the upcoming Xbox-centric handheld gaming device developed by ASUS and Microsoft. Players can explore their Xbox library now fully optimized for ROG Ally. Specifically tested by the Xbox team, players can seek out thousands of games that are ready to enjoy on the go with the ROG Xbox Ally. The ROG Xbox Ally is launching on October 16.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: ROG Xbox Ally - Official Handheld Compatibility Introduction Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
We played Resident Evil Requiem at gamescom 2025 and got to witness the latest terrifying Resident Evil stalker to rival Mr. X and Lady Dimitrescu.

The latest stalker in the Resident Evil series takes the chase to the next level, hunting Grace Ashcroft throughout the hallways of the small but impactful Resident Evil Requiem demo. IGN's Matt Purslow and Dale Driver got to go hands-on with the game and discuss their initial impressions of the latest Resident Evil game coming out in 2026.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 - Legacy of the Forge.

#gamescom2025
title: Resident Evil Requiem Takes Stalkers to the Next Terrifying Level | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
IGN's tech expert Will Judd speaks to the developers of the Asus ROG Ally X about some of the more intricate details about the new Xbox handheld, the ROG Xbox Ally X, including the speed of the handheld, the triggers, and whether an OLED screen was ever considered. 

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Borderlands 4.

#gamescom2025
title: ROG Xbox Ally Dev Answers Our Lingering Questions | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Capcom's Pragmata has a new system for shooting mechanics, asking you to do a hacking mini-game before each enemy encounter. It's a fresh take, but is it a good thing? After playing the Pragmata demo at gamescom 2025, IGN's Matt Purslow and Dale Driver have some mixed feelings, enjoying the innovation but with slight concerns that the process could wear thin over a full game.

What do you think about the first look at Pragmata gameplay? Are you interested in playing Pragmata yourself when it releases in 2026? 

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Pragmata Rethinks Shooting but Is That a Good Thing? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
We talk to Call of Duty developers Miles Leslie and Natalie Pohorski at gamescom 2025 to find out how Black Ops 7's co-op campaign takes cues from the Batman Arkham games by using fear toxin as the basis of the weirdest COD missions we've seen yet.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will be coming to PlayStation, Xbox, and PC on November 14, 2025.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Borderlands 4.

#gamescom2025
title: How Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's Campaign Weaponizes Fear | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at fast-paced, brutal gameplay from Rogue Point in this new trailer for the upcoming 4-player cooperative shooter game. In Rogue Point, team up with friends and build an elite tactical team. Plan and execute challenging missions in a dynamic rogue-lite structure with hundreds of ways to play. Rogue Point will be available on PC via Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Rogue Point - Official Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Fight off an invading army with acrobatic flair in Evil Empire's stylish 2D action roguelite The Rogue Prince of Persia, out now on Xbox. 
This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia - Xbox Launch Trailer, Breakdown, and Interview | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
The legend begins October 7th.

Embark on a co-op action RPG adventure through a vibrant SNES-style world. Master elemental powers, uncover ancient secrets, and face a destiny that will decide the fate of the realm.

Play solo or with a friend in classic two-hero co-op.

Wishlist now on Steam to be ready when the journey begins!

Add to your Wishlist today: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1435410/Shrines_Legacy/]

If you want something with more urgency and hype for the launch month:

Your quest begins October 7th!

Join the heroes in Shrine’s Legacy — a fast-paced, story-rich co-op action RPG inspired by the golden age of SNES adventures. Fight together, solve ancient puzzles, and wield the elements to save the world.

Wishlist on Steam now so you’re ready on day one!

Wishlist here: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1435410/Shrines_Legacy/]
title: Shrine's Legacy - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Game Access and Compatibility Overview Trailer for ROG Xbox Ally, the upcoming Xbox-centric handheld developed by ASUS and Microsoft. Players can take the Xbox experience on the go with the upcoming ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, allowing players to play Xbox and PC games while mobile. Get the rundown on the specific optimizations and features for the ROG Xbox Ally and the ROG Ally X, launching on October 16.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: ROG Xbox Ally - Official Game Access and Compatibility Overview Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
The ROG Xbox Ally and Ally X use your Xbox sign in, so you can go handheld whenever you want and keep your Achievements, games, and everything else. Seamlessly play how you want when they come out on October 16. 
This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: ROG Xbox Ally and Ally X Handheld Breakdown | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Co-op is nothing new to LEGO games, certainly, but LEGO Voyagers removes the “optional” from the co-op, and strips any big-IP license away as well. We’re left with a game that combines puzzles and platforming and puts it in a compelling co-op package. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey
title: LEGO Voyagers Might Already Be My Favorite LEGO Game Ever

author: IGN
description:
Operation Stutter is the debut psychological horror game from Kevir Entertainment! 

Explore a top-secret research facility during the height of the Cold War. Operation Stutter will see you moving between the shadows of the facility, solving puzzles, watching reality bend around you and fleeing the horrors contained within your own mind and the facility itself! 

A debut horror game from Kevir, the worlds first indie game studio from Iraqi Kurdistan! 
Check out the Steam listing for this upcoming horror game! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3908090/Operation_Stutter/

#IGN #OperationStutter #HorrorGames
title: Operation Stutter - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new trailer for Stalker 2 revealing the PS5 release date.

Developer GSC Game World has announced that  S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl will be released on PlayStation 5 and PS5 Pro in late 2025. The team says the PS5 version "will fully utilize DualSense controller features, including haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for deeper player immersion. Further technical enhancements for the PS5 Pro are also in development." STALKER 2 released to critical acclaim on PC and Xbox Series X|S last November, with IGN awarding the survival first-person shooter an 8 out of 10.

#stalker2
title: Stalker 2 - Official PS5 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: So far, The Blood of Dawnwalker captures that feeling of navigating two different worlds as a half-vampire, which is a very compelling premise for a role-playing game. Previewed by Alessandro Fillari
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker Is a Vampire RPG in a Big Narrative Sandbox

author: IGN
description:
Interested in finding out how Capcom draws the line between a dark samurai tale and sparky anime humour? 

In our Onimusha: Way of the Sword Hands-On Preview, we'll break down exactly what we thought of the brief gamescom 2025 demo, from the supernatural samurai fighting demon combat, and more.

#IGN #Onimusha #Gamescom2025
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword Hands-on Preview | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Pragmata, Capcom's all new sci-fi action adventure is certainly shooting for a very interesting take on action and combat. 

We went hands-on with this all new hack-and-blast at Gamescom 2025, but is this new take on third person shooters as smart as it seems? 

#IGN #Pragmata #Gamescom2025
title: Pragmata Hands-On Preview | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Resident Evil Requiem has a new, terrifying foe that more than lives up to the mantle of a Resident Evil stalker.

My short playtime was such a small sample size of Resident Evil Requiem that it’s very hard at this early stage to know where the ninth entry in the mainline series will fit in comparison to its predecessors. And that’s assuming that the scenario in this demo will even feature in the full game at all – there’s the possibility of this being a bespoke demo, something Capcom has prior experience in with Resident Evil 7’s “Beginning Hour” demo. But even if this is just a tonal example, it’s very hard not to be excited for what horrors Resident Evil Requiem has in store for us when this unstoppable beast arrives early next year.

In this first look at Resident Evil Requiem gameplay, we get to see the new stalker in action, relentlessly pursuing Grace Ashcroft from both first-person and third-person Resident Evil gameplay.

#IGN #ResidentEvilRequiem #Gamescom2025
title: Resident Evil Requiem Hands-On Preview (With Gameplay!)

author: IGN
description:
Check out 42 minutes of gameplay from High on Life 2 in this video for a demo playthrough of this upcoming comedy first-person shooter game sequel from Squanch Games. The demo shows action-packed gameplay as part of a mission to kill Senator Muppy Doo. The demo features a star-studded cast, including Ralph Ineson (Sheath), Michael Cusack (Knifey), J.B. Smoove (Gus), Betsy Sodaro (Sweezy), Dave Herman (Gene), Shelby Young (Lizzie), Eric Bauza (Brutus), Alec Robbins (Suit-O), and Richard Kind (Muppy Doo). High on Life 2 will be available this winter on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, Xbox Cloud Gaming, Xbox Play Anywhere, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Epic Games Store for PC, and Steam for PC.

In High of Life 2, you’ve done it. You’ve taken down an intergalactic cartel, brought humanity back from the brink of extinction, and hunted dangerous bounties to the far corners of the galaxy. Bounty hunting has brought you fortune, fame and love; but when a mysterious figure from your past rea
title: High On Life 2 - 42 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Project Remind, a first-person, story-driven puzzle game developed by Red Hog Studio and Full Dive Games. Players will make sense of complex machinery to understand the circumstances of a forgotten life through solving environmental puzzles. Uncover hidden passages and reveal the mysteries of Project Remind, coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Project Remind - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Exclusive Gameplay Trailer for Project Spectrum, an upcoming first-person horror shooter developed by Team Jade. Players will explore haunted ruins to take on paranormal enemies in Nightfall Manor. Gather resources for weapon upgrades, and take on larger-than-life monsters with equipment like Molotov cocktails alongside powerful weapons. The latest Exclusive Gameplay Trailer also shows a second playable enemy in the form or one of the said paranormal enemies as well. Project Spectrum is coming soon.
title: Project Spectrum - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get your latest look at The Competitor, Hyperkin's upcoming DualSense-style Xbox controller featuring Hall-effect sticks and triggers and a PS5-style layout. The Hyperkin Competitor launches this October for $49.99, and pre-orders will be available soon.
title: Hyperkin Comptetitor Xbox Controller – Official Features Trailer

author: IGN
description: 2K has confirmed the troubled state of their long-in-development BioShock project at their internal studio Cloud Chamber. Unfortunately, there were layoffs as the project refocuses. But the good news is that they've brought in a familiar face whose reputation is getting games shipped: Rod Fergusson. IGN's Ryan McCaffrey and Mark Medina discuss what it all means for the next BioShock game, and when we might finally see it get released.
title: BioShock 4 Status Update: There's Good News and Bad News...
